[He]3555-the patient further added , [we]3560-we are informed , that [he]3555-the patient was in a position to reward [the hospital authorities]3563-the hospital authorities for any trouble [he]3555-the patient gave , by making a present to the funds of [the charity]3564-the charity , as soon as [he]3555-the patient should be discharged as cured . [His]3555-the patient coolness in the midst of sufferings which would deprive [most other men]3565-most other men of all power of thinking or speaking , is as remarkable as [his]3555-the patient unflinching secrecy - a secrecy which , for the present at least , [we]3560-we can not hope to penetrate . "[0-i]

[I]0-i closed the newspaper . Even then , a vague forewarning of what [Mannion]51-mr. mannion 's inexplicable reserve boded towards [me]0-i , crossed [my]0-i mind . There was yet more difficulty , danger , and horror to be faced , than [I]0-i had hitherto confronted . The slough of degradation and misery into which [I]0-i had fallen , had its worst perils yet in store for [me]0-i .

As [I]0-i became impressed by this conviction , the enervating remembrance of the wickedness to which [I]0-i had been sacrificed , grew weaker in its influence over [me]0-i ; the bitter tears that [I]0-i had shed in secret for so many days past , dried sternly at their sources ; and [I]0-i felt the power to endure and to resist coming back to [me]0-i with [my]0-i sense of the coming strife . On leaving [the library]1061-the library , [I]0-i ascended again to [[my]0-i own room]3311-my own room . In a basket , on [my]0-i table , lay several unopened letters , which had arrived for [me]0-i during [my]0-i illness . There were two which [I]0-i at once suspected , in hastily turning over the collection , might be all - important in enlightening [me]0-i on the vile subject of [[Mannion]51-mr. mannion 's female accomplice]2027-mannion 's female accomplice . The addresses of both these letters were in [Mr. Sherwin]42-mr. sherwin 's handwriting . The first that [I]0-i opened was dated nearly a month back , and ran thus :

" [North Villa]11-north villa , [Hollyoake Square]12-hollyoake square .[2028-i]

" [DEAR SIR]3566-dear sir ,[42-mr. sherwin]

" With agonised feelings which [no one]743-no one but [a parent]3568-a parent , and [I]2028-i will add , [an affectionate parent]3569-an affectionate parent , can possibly form an idea of , [I]2028-i address [you]3566-dear sir on the subject of the act of atrocity committed by [that perjured villain]3570-that perjured villain , [Mannion]51-mr. mannion . [You]3566-dear sir will find that [I]2028-i and [[my]2028-i innocent daughter]3571-my innocent daughter have been , like [you]3566-dear sir , victims of the most devilish deceit that ever was practised on [respectable and unsuspecting people]3572-respectable and unsuspecting people .[2028-i]

" Let [me]42-mr. sherwin ask [you]3566-dear sir , [Sir]3046-sir , to imagine the state of [my]42-mr. sherwin feelings on the night of that most unfortunate party , when [I]42-mr. sherwin saw [[my]42-mr. sherwin beloved]3574-my beloved [Margaret]44-margaret , instead of coming [home]176-home quietly as usual , rush into [the room]263-the room in a state bordering on distraction , with a tale the most horrible that ever was addressed to [a father]3249-a father 's ears . [The double - faced villain [I]42-mr. sherwin really ca n't mention [his]3578-the double - faced villain i really ca n't mention his name name]3578-the double - faced villain i really ca n't mention his name again had , [I]42-mr. sherwin blush to acknowledge , attempted to take advantage of [her]44-margaret innocence and confidence - all [our]3579-our innocences and confidences , [I]42-mr. sherwin may say - but [[my]42-mr. sherwin dear]3163-my dear [Margaret]44-margaret showed a virtuous courage beyond [her]44-margaret years , the natural result of the pious principles and the moral bringing up which [I]42-mr. sherwin have given [her]44-margaret from [[her]44-margaret cradle]3581-her cradle . Need [I]42-mr. sherwin say what was the upshot ? Virtue triumphed , as virtue always does , and [the villain]3582-the villain left [her]44-margaret to [herself]44-margaret . It was when [she]44-margaret was approaching the door - step to fly to the bosom of [[her]44-margaret home]722-her home that , [I]42-mr. sherwin am given to understand , [you]3584-you , by a most remarkable accident , met [her]44-margaret . As [a man of [the world]158-the world]3250-a man of the world , [you]3584-you will easily conceive what must have been the feelings of [a young female]3587-a young female , under such peculiar and shocking circumstances . Besides this , [your]3584-you manner , as [I]42-mr. sherwin am informed , was so terrifying and extraordinary , and [my]42-mr. sherwin poor [Margaret]44-margaret felt so strongly that deceitful appearances might be against [her]44-margaret , that [she]44-margaret lost all heart , and fled at once , as [I]42-mr. sherwin said before , to the bosom of [[her]44-margaret home]722-her home .[42-mr. sherwin]

" [She]44-margaret is still in a very nervous and unhappy state ; [she]44-margaret fears that [you]3584-you may be too ready to believe appearances ; but [I]2028-i know better . [Her]44-margaret explanation will be enough for [you]3584-you , as it was for [me]2028-i . [We]3589-we may have [our]3589-we little differences on minor topics , but [we]3589-we have both the same manly confidence , [I]2028-i am sure - [you]3584-you in [[your]3584-you wife]3287-your wife , and [me]2028-i in [[my]2028-i daughter]3132-my daughter .[2028-i]

" [I]42-mr. sherwin called at [[[your]3584-you worthy father]3592-your worthy father 's mansion]3593-your worthy father 's mansion , to have a fuller explanation with [you]3584-you than [I]42-mr. sherwin can give here , the morning after this to - [all - parties - most - distressing occurrence]3594-all - parties - most - distressing occurrence happened : and was then informed of [your]3584-you serious illness , for which [pray]42-mr. sherwin accept [my]42-mr. sherwin best condolences . The next thing [I]42-mr. sherwin thought of doing was to write to [[your]3584-you respected father]3128-your respected father , requesting a private interview . But on maturer consideration , [I]42-mr. sherwin thought it perhaps slightly injudicious to take such a step , while [you]3584-you , as [the principal party concerned]3596-the principal party concerned , were ill in bed , and not able to come forward and back [me]42-mr. sherwin . [I]42-mr. sherwin was anxious , [you]3584-you will observe , to act for [your]3584-you interests , as well as the interests of [[my]42-mr. sherwin darling girl]3597-my darling girl - of course , knowing at the same time that [I]42-mr. sherwin had the marriage certificate in [my]42-mr. sherwin possession , if needed as a proof , and supposing [I]42-mr. sherwin was driven to extremities and obliged to take [my]42-mr. sherwin own course in the matter . But , as [I]42-mr. sherwin said before , [I]42-mr. sherwin have a fatherly and friendly confidence in [your]3584-you feeling as convinced of the spotless innocence of [[my]42-mr. sherwin child]3598-my child as [I]42-mr. sherwin do . So will write no more on this head .[42-mr. sherwin]

" Having determined , as best under all circumstances , to wait till [your]3584-you illness was over , [I]2028-i have kept [my]2028-i dear [Margaret]44-margaret in strict retirement at [home]176-home which , as [she]44-margaret is [[your]3584-you wife]3287-your wife , [you]3584-you will acknowledge [I]2028-i had no obligation to do , until [you]3584-you were well enough to come forward and do [her]44-margaret justice before [[her]44-margaret family]3601-her family and [yours]3584-you . [I]2028-i have not omitted to make almost daily inquiries after [you]3584-you , up to the time of penning these lines , and shall continue so to do until [your]3584-you convalescence , which [I]2028-i sincerely hope may be speedily at hand ; [I]2028-i am unfortunately obliged to ask that [our]3602-our first interview , when [you]3584-you are able to see [me]2028-i and [[my]2028-i daughter]3132-my daughter , may not take place at [North Villa]11-north villa , but at some other place , any [you]3584-you like to fix on . The fact is , [[my]2028-i wife]864-my wife , whose wretched health has been a trouble and annoyance to [us]3602-our for years past , has now , [I]2028-i grieve to say , under pressure of this sad misfortune , quite lost [her]864-my wife reason . [I]2028-i am sorry to say that [she]864-my wife would be capable of interrupting [us]3602-our here , in a most undesirable manner to [all parties]3293-all parties , and therefore request that [our]3602-our first happy meeting may not take place at [[my]2028-i house]3400-my house .[2028-i]

" Trusting that this letter will quite remove all unpleasant feelings from [your]3584-you mind , and that [I]42-mr. sherwin shall hear from [you]3584-you soon , on [your]3584-you much - to - be - desired recovery ,[42-mr. sherwin]

" [I]2028-i remain , [dear Sir]3566-dear sir ,[2028-i]

" [[Your]3584-you faithful , obedient servant]3608-your faithful , obedient servant ,[42-mr. sherwin]

" [STEPHEN SHERWIN]69-stephen sherwin .[2028-i]

" [P. S.]70-p. s. - [I]42-mr. sherwin have not been able to find out where [that scoundrel Mannion]3609-that scoundrel mannion , has betaken [himself]3609-that scoundrel mannion to ; but if [you]3584-you should know , or suspect , [I]42-mr. sherwin wish to tell [you]3584-you , as a proof that [my]42-mr. sherwin indignation at [[his]3609-that scoundrel mannion villany]3610-his villany is as great as [yours]3584-you , that [I]42-mr. sherwin am ready and anxious to pursue [him]3609-that scoundrel mannion with the utmost rigour of the law , if law can only reach [him]3609-that scoundrel mannion - paying out of [my]42-mr. sherwin own pocket all expenses of punishing [him]3609-that scoundrel mannion and breaking [him]3609-that scoundrel mannion for the rest of [his]3609-that scoundrel mannion life , if [I]42-mr. sherwin go through [every court in [the country]370-the country]3611-every court in the country to do it ! - S. S. "[42-mr. sherwin]

Hurriedly as [I]0-i read over this wretched and revolting letter , [I]0-i detected immediately how the new plot had been framed to keep [me]0-i still deceived ; to heap wrong after wrong on [me]0-i with the same impunity . [She]2028-i was not aware that [I]0-i had followed [her]2028-i into [the house]244-the house , and had heard all from [her]2028-i voice and [Mannion]51-mr. mannion 's - [she]2028-i believed that [I]0-i was still ignorant of everything , until [we]2030-we met at the door - step ; and in this conviction [she]2028-i had forged the miserable lie which [[her]2028-i father]1224-her father 's hand had written down . Did [he]1224-her father really believe it , or was [he]1224-her father writing as [[her]2028-i accomplice]2032-her accomplice ? It was not worth while to inquire : the worst and darkest discovery which it concerned [me]0-i to make , had already proclaimed itself - [she]2028-i was [a liar]2033-a liar and [a hypocrite]2034-a hypocrite to the very last !

And it was [this woman]2035-this woman 's lightest glance which had once been to [me]0-i as the star that [my]0-i life looked to ! - -it was for [this woman]2035-this woman that [I]0-i had practised a deceit on [[my]0-i family]197-my family which it now revolted [me]0-i to think of ; had braved whatever [[my]0-i father]147-my father 's anger might inflict ; had risked cheerfully the loss of all that birth and fortune could bestow ! Why had [I]0-i ever risen from [my]0-i weary bed of sickness ? - it would have been better , far better , that [I]0-i had died !

But , while life remained , life had its trials and its toils , from which it was useless to shrink . There was still another letter to be opened : there was yet more wickedness which [I]0-i must know how to confront .

The second of [Mr. Sherwin]42-mr. sherwin 's letters was much shorter than the first , and had apparently been written not more than a day or two back . [His]42-mr. sherwin tone was changed ; [he]42-mr. sherwin truckled to [me]0-i no longer - [he]42-mr. sherwin began to threaten . [I]0-i was reminded that [the servant]315-the servant 's report pronounced [me]0-i to have been convalescent for several days past : and was asked why , under these circumstances , [I]0-i had never even written . [I]0-i was warned that [my]0-i silence had been construed greatly to [my]0-i disadvantage ; and that if it continued longer , [the writer]495-the writer would assert [[his]495-the writer daughter]233-his daughter 's cause loudly and publicly , not to [[my]0-i father]147-my father only , but to all [the world]158-the world . The letter ended by according to [me]0-i three days more of grace , before the fullest disclosure would be made .

For a moment , [my]0-i indignation got the better of [me]0-i . [I]0-i rose , to go that instant to [North Villa]11-north villa and unmask [the wretches who still thought to make [their]2044-the wretches who still thought to make their market of me as easily as ever market of [me]0-i as easily as ever]2044-the wretches who still thought to make their market of me as easily as ever . But the mere momentary delay caused by opening the door of [[my]0-i room]136-my room , restored [me]0-i to [myself]0-i . [I]0-i felt that [my]0-i first duty , [my]0-i paramount obligation , was to confess all to [[my]0-i father]147-my father immediately ; to know and accept [my]0-i future position in [[my]0-i own home]1643-my own home , before [I]0-i went out from [it]1643-my own home to denounce [others]98-others . [I]0-i returned to the table , and gathered up the letters scattered on it . [My]0-i heart beat fast , [my]0-i head felt confused ; but [I]0-i was resolute in [my]0-i determination to tell [[my]0-i father]147-my father , at all hazards , the tale of degradation which [I]0-i have told in these pages .

[I]0-i waited in the stillness and loneliness , until it grew nearly dark . [The servant]315-the servant brought in candles . Why could [I]0-i not ask [him]315-the servant whether [[my]0-i father]147-my father and [Clara]57-clara had come [home]176-home yet ? Was [I]0-i faltering in [my]0-i resolution already ?

Shortly after this , [I]0-i heard a step on the stairs and a knock at [my]0-i door . - [[My]0-i father]147-my father ? No ! [Clara]57-clara . [I]0-i tried to speak to [her]315-the servant unconcernedly , when [she]315-the servant came in .

" Why , [you]57-clara have been walking till it is quite dark , [Clara]57-clara ! "[315-the servant]

" [We]3613-we have only been in [the garden of [the Square]717-the square]3614-the garden of the square - neither [papa]3052-papa nor [I]315-the servant noticed how late it was . [We]3613-we were talking on a subject of the deepest interest to [us]3613-we both . "[315-the servant]

[She]315-the servant paused a moment , and looked down ; then hurriedly came nearer to [me]0-i , and drew a chair to [my]0-i side . There was a strange expression of sadness and anxiety in [her]315-the servant face , as [she]315-the servant continued :

" Ca n't [you]0-i imagine what the subject was ? It was [you]0-i , [Basil]46-basil . [Papa]58-papa is coming [here]3265-here directly , to speak to [you]0-i . "[315-the servant]

[She]315-the servant stopped once more . [Her]315-the servant cheeks reddened a little , and [she]315-the servant mechanically busied [herself]315-the servant in arranging some books that lay on the table . Suddenly , [she]315-the servant abandoned this employment ; the colour left [her]315-the servant face ; it was quite pale when [she]315-the servant addressed [me]0-i again , speaking in very altered tones ; so altered , that [I]0-i hardly recognised them as [hers]315-the servant .

" [You]0-i know , [Basil]46-basil , that for a long time past , [you]0-i have kept some secret from [us]3618-us ; and [you]0-i promised that [I]315-the servant should know it first ; but [I]315-the servant - [I]315-the servant have changed [my]315-the servant mind ; [I]315-the servant have no wish to know it , [dear]3113-dear : [I]315-the servant would rather [we]3618-us never said anything about it . "[315-the servant] [She]315-the servant coloured , and hesitated a little again , then proceeded quickly and earnestly : " But [I]315-the servant hope [you]46-basil will tell it all to [papa]3052-papa : [he]3052-papa is coming here to ask [you]46-basil - oh , [Basil]46-basil ! be candid with [him]3052-papa , and tell [him]3052-papa everything ; let [us]3618-us all be to [one another]3621-one another what [we]3618-us were before this time last year ! [I]315-the servant only came here to prepare [you]46-basil ; to beg [you]46-basil to be candid and patient . Hush ! there is a step on the stairs . [She]2054-she hurriedly left [the room]263-the room . The next minute , [[my]0-i father]147-my father entered it .

Perhaps [my]0-i guilty conscience deceived [me]0-i , but [I]0-i thought [he]147-my father looked at [me]0-i more sadly and severely than [I]0-i had ever seen [him]147-my father look before . [His]147-my father voice , too , was troubled when [he]147-my father spoke . This was a change , which meant much in [him]147-my father .

" [I]147-my father have come to speak to [you]0-i , "[147-my father] [he]147-my father said , " on a subject about which [I]147-my father had much rather [you]0-i had spoken to [me]147-my father first . "[147-my father]

" [I]147-my father think , [Sir]3046-sir , [I]147-my father know to what subject [you]147-my father refer . [I]147-my father - "[147-my father]

" [I]147-my father must beg [you]0-i will listen to [me]147-my father as patiently as [you]0-i can , "[147-my father] [he]147-my father rejoined ; " [I]147-my father have not much to say . "[147-my father]

[He]147-my father paused , and sighed heavily . [I]0-i thought [he]147-my father looked at [me]0-i more kindly . [My]0-i heart grew very sad ; and [I]0-i yearned to throw [my]0-i arms round [his]147-my father neck , to give freedom to the repressed tears which half choked [me]0-i , to weep out on [his]147-my father bosom [my]0-i confession that [I]0-i was no more worthy to be called [[his]147-my father son]412-his son . Oh , that [I]0-i had obeyed the impulse which moved [me]0-i to do this !

" [Basil]46-basil , "[147-my father] pursued [[my]0-i father]147-my father , gravely and sadly ; " [I]147-my father hope and believe that [I]147-my father have little to reproach [myself]147-my father with in [my]147-my father conduct towards [you]46-basil . [I]147-my father think [I]147-my father am justified in saying , that [very few fathers]3623-very few fathers would have acted towards [a son]3624-a son as [I]147-my father have acted for the last year or more . [I]147-my father may often have grieved over the secresy which has estranged [you]46-basil from [us]3625-us ; [I]147-my father may even have shown [you]46-basil by [my]147-my father manner that [I]147-my father resented it ; but [I]147-my father have never used [my]147-my father authority to force [you]46-basil into the explanation of [your]46-basil conduct , which [you]46-basil have been so uniformly unwilling to volunteer . [I]147-my father rested on that implicit faith in the honour and integrity of [[my]147-my father son]3626-my son , which [I]147-my father will not yet believe to have been ill - placed , but which , [I]147-my father fear , has led [me]147-my father to neglect too long the duty of inquiry which [I]147-my father owed to [your]46-basil own well - being , and to [my]147-my father position towards [you]46-basil . [I]147-my father am now here to atone for this omission ; circumstances have left [me]147-my father no choice . It deeply concerns [my]147-my father interest as [a father]3249-a father , and [my]147-my father honour as [the head of [[our]3629-our family]145-our family]3628-the head of our family , to know what heavy misfortune it was [I]147-my father can imagine it to be nothing else that stretched [[my]147-my father son]3626-my son senseless in [the open street]3632-the open street , and afflicted [him]3626-my son afterwards with an illness which threatened [his]3626-my son reason and [his]3626-my son life . [You]46-basil are now sufficiently recovered to reveal this ; and [I]147-my father only use [my]147-my father legitimate authority over [[my]147-my father own children]3633-my own children , when [I]147-my father tell [you]46-basil that [I]147-my father must now know all . " [I]2059-i am ready to make [my]2059-i confession , [Sir]3046-sir .
